title: wine_Giuseppe_Rinaldi_2013_Brunate__(Barolo)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 16773.
country: Italy.
description: Classic Nebbiolo aromas of new leather, menthol, pressed rose, perfumed wild berry and chopped aromatic herb continuously lift out of the glass. The luminous, delicious palate delivers layers of succulent Marasca cherry, crushed raspberry, cinnamon and star anise set against a backbone of youthfully assertive but fine tannins. Bright acidity gives it wonderful balance while a note of pipe tobacco graces the lingering finish. Drink 2028–2048..
designation: Brunate.
points: 98.
price: 300.0.
province: Piedmont.
region_1: Barolo.
region_2: .
taster_name: Kerin O’Keefe.
